e4: Implementing a new policy based on accurate earnings reporting will build long-term trust with investors while potentially avoiding legal issues. e5: An ethical reporting policy aligns with integrity and accuracy, prioritizing stakeholder trust above short-term profits. Crucially, such policies should prevent manipulation or misleading behavior that could erode investor confidence, ultimately impacting shareholder value.
